title: Create codebase scorer and reporter
description: Create src/evaluation/codebase/codebase-scorer.ts and codebase-reporter.ts - calculate scores from validation results, generate markdown comparison reports

title: Create Dagger codebase runner
description: Create src/evaluation/codebase/dagger-codebase-runner.ts - extends DaggerRunner to mount full codebase using dag.host().directory(), install dependencies, run validation commands (test, build, lint)

title: Create example codebase benchmark script
description: Create scripts/benchmark-codebase.ts - example script that runs multiple models against a sample project with a coding task, similar to benchmark-prime-numbers.ts

title: Create tool-validator.ts
description: Implement ToolValidator class for validating tool calls match expectations, including parameter matching with predicate support

title: Create codebase evaluation strategy
description: Create src/evaluation/strategies/codebase-evaluation.ts - main orchestrator: load context, for each model generate response, extract changes, apply to copy, run validation in Dagger, score results, generate comparative report

title: Create session types in src/sessions/types.ts
description: Define TypeScript interfaces for SessionIndexEntry, SessionMessage, ContentBlock, and TokenUsage based on Claude's session storage format

title: Implement sessions list command
description: Show table of sessions for current directory with ID, date, message count, and first prompt preview

title: Implement sessions stats command
description: Calculate and display token usage, cache stats, and estimated cost for a session

title: Create conversation-runner.ts
description: Implement ConversationRunner class - main execution engine for running multi-step tool scenarios against models

title: Implement sessions export command
description: Export session to markdown or JSON format with conversation, tool calls, and metadata

title: Create change extractor
description: Create src/evaluation/codebase/change-extractor.ts - extracts code changes from model responses in unified diff, git patch, or markdown code block formats

title: Build JSONL parser for session transcripts
description: Create session-parser.ts that parses .jsonl transcript files, extracts messages, tool calls, and token usage

title: Create codebase evaluation types
description: Create src/evaluation/codebase/types.ts with interfaces for CodebaseConfig, CodingTask, ValidationCommand, ExtractedChanges, ApplicationResult, ValidationResult, CodebaseScores, CodebaseEvaluationResult
close_reason: Created src/evaluation/codebase/types.ts with all required interfaces: CodebaseConfig, CodingTask, ValidationCommand, ExtractedChanges, ApplicationResult, ValidationResult, CodebaseScores, CodebaseEvaluationResult, plus supporting types

title: Create types.ts for tool testing
description: Define core types: ConversationStep, ExpectedToolCall, StepValidation, ToolTestScenario, ToolTestResult

title: Create change applicator
description: Create src/evaluation/codebase/change-applicator.ts - creates isolated copy of codebase, applies extracted diffs/patches, reports success/failure per file

title: Create index.ts for tool-testing module
description: Export all tool-testing components

title: Implement sessions messages command
description: Show conversation messages with timestamps, support --limit flag for pagination

title: Multi-step tool conversation evaluation framework
close_reason: Implemented multi-step tool conversation evaluation framework

title: Build stream formatter for live stream-json output
description: Create stream-formatter.ts that reads JSONL from stdin and outputs human-readable formatted text for piping from claude -p --output-format stream-json

title: Create test-tool-conversations.ts evaluation script
description: Create standalone evaluation script with example scenarios (calculator multi-step, tool selection)

title: Add sessions command to CLI
description: Create src/cli/sessions.ts with Commander.js subcommand structure and add to main CLI in cli.ts

title: Implement sessions show command
description: Display detailed session info including project, branch, duration, message counts, tool calls, tokens, and estimated cost

title: Implement sessions tools command
description: Extract and display tool_use blocks from assistant messages with tool name and input parameters

title: Build session store to read sessions-index.json
description: Create session-store.ts that finds the Claude projects directory, reads sessions-index.json, and returns session metadata for a given project path

title: Create tool-scoring.ts
description: Implement ToolScorer class with heuristic and AI-based scoring for tool usage quality

title: Create codebase context provider
description: Create src/evaluation/codebase/context-provider.ts - loads codebase files based on include/exclude patterns, detects project type (npm, pip, cargo), formats file tree + contents for model prompt, creates Stimulus with codebase context

title: Implement sessions format command
description: Read JSONL from stdin and output formatted text for piping: claude -p ... --output-format stream-json | umwelten sessions format
